title: BEAUTIFULLY UPDATED SMART HOME located in Lakeshore!! Available NOW!
posting_body: ['Interested in living on the best block in Oakland??', 'This incredible Craftsman Smart home is ready for new occupants.', "You won't want to miss this recently renovated and freshly painted 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath craftsman beauty at the gateway between Oakland and Piedmont .", 'Centrally located within walking distance to everything you need including grocery and natural food stores, restaurants, parks, and the Grand Lake Theater.', 'Welcome to your new home!!', 'The home has been  lovingly maintained over its lifetime and it shows in the period details.', ' Enter into the foyer and immediately step into the large living room with great park views, built in shelves surrounding the fireplace, ceiling fan, and hardwood floors.', 'Fall in love with the beautifully remodeled kitchen that has everything you need including side-by-side refrigerator, gas stove & oven, built in wine fridge, and dishwasher.', ' Catch the evening news, weekend cartoons, etc from the kitchen overlooking the family room.', 'A half bathroom is located on the 1st floor also.', 'Each of the 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms are located on the 2nd floor.', 'Step out on the balcony right outside your primary bedroom to catch the sunset.', 'The ensuite bathroom was perfectly designed w/separate shower, dual vanities, soaking tub, and heated floors!', 'Finally, one of the secondary bedrooms includes an additional bonus "room" previously used as a study, sunroom, and exercise room.', 'The backyard has both gravel play or sitting area and a separate area with artificial grass perfect for pets & play!', "This incredible home has been completely updated to today's standards including a solar energy system, air conditioning (upstairs), smart thermostats and smart lighting.", '$6500 rent per month', '$6400 deposit', '$45 application fee per adult applicant/occupant', 'Pets accepted with additional deposit and pet fee']
